meanings.definition: A ball or perforated container of sweet-smelling substances such as herbs and spices, placed in a closet, drawer, or room to perfume the air.
meanings.sent1: I placed the pomanders in my drawer to make it smell nice.
meanings.sent2: She bought a few pomanders to freshen up her room.
meanings.sent3: The pomanders in the closet were like little air fresheners.
meanings.sent4: The pomanders filled the room with a delightful aroma.
meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of the pomanders lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: A ball or perforated container of sweet-smelling substances such as herbs and spices, carried to ward off unpleasant smells.
meanings.sent1: Carrying pomanders helped keep the bad smells away.
meanings.sent2: The pomanders in her bag masked the odor of the fish market.
meanings.sent3: He always carried pomanders to avoid stinky situations.
meanings.sent4: The pomanders acted like a shield against foul odors.
meanings.sent5: The pleasant fragrance of the pomanders protected her from the unpleasant smells.
